creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: Mishima Bowl; all-over comb motif with five flowers in interior and band of flowers circling sides; pottery with grey glaze, stoneware
medium: Buncheong ware with stamped design under glaze
text: This punch'ong bowl displays a mode of decoration known as "rope curtain" because the rows of densely stamped circles resemble the thick, twisted rope curtain hung across doorways.
title: Mishima Bowl
